attributes.action: put more taxes towards fixing schools than towards the technology
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I go to a comprehensive school were it took over 2 months to get a light bulb changed and we still have a table to use that could be easily fixed but has been broken since summer 2007.
and yet they are given money to put 15 new flat screen computers into the cantene. even though we have a libary and a i.c.t building full of computers.
